## Octree.getChunk() method

Gets the chunk by a given index

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  level | number | The chunk index |

**Returns:**

[OctreeNodeChunk](doc/markdown/./scene.octreenodechunk.md)
